articles.title: Greetings to Mexican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mexican President
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam. President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mexican President Felipe Calderon Hinojosa on the occasion of the 202nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message extended warm congratulations to the president, government and people of Mexico and wished the friendly Mexican people progress and prosperity on the 202nd anniversary of its independence.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Mexico would steadily grow in conformity with their common interests.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mexican Secretary of Foreign Affairs
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mexican Secretary of Foreign Affairs 
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mexican Secretary of Foreign Affairs Patricia Espinosa Cantellano on the occasion of the 202nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Pak wished him good health and success in his work.

articles.title: Chinese Youth Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Youth Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The youth friendship delegation of China led by Wang Hongyan, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President at Mangyongdae the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved there with care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The delegation visited Kyongsang Kindergarten. The members of the delegation looked round with keen interest the kindergarten which was built thanks to the warm love shown by the dear respected Kim Jong Un for the younger generation, true to the noble intention of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.  
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, etc.

articles.title: Director-general of IIJI Interviewed
articles.content:
Director-general of IIJI Interviewed
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, was interviewed by KCNA on Sunday.
					 He expressed deep respect for the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The mightiness of the country and the nation is decided not by the size of territory and number of population but by the greatness of its leader. 
					
					 The DPRK has demonstrated its might as a great country as it holds in high esteem Kim Jong Un possessed of rare wisdom, firm will and matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is well versed in all fields including politics, military affairs and economy.
					
					 He is doing all work, always finding himself among soldiers and people.
					
					 The might of the DPRK has grown stronger thanks to his wise leadership.
					
					 All service personnel and people of the DPRK boundlessly respect and follow him.
					
					 They are fully determined to glorify Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people rallied close around Kim Jong Un are pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Korean people are firmly defending the sovereignty of the country, the dignity of the nation and socialist gains.
					
					 They have also achieved laudable successes in production and construction by fully displaying boundless devotion.
					
					 This greatly inspires the progressive people of the world.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces have staged ceaseless large-scale war exercises for aggression in a bid to stifle socialist Korea. But this is a daydream.
					
					 We followers of the Juche idea extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people dynamically advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I am sure that only victory and glory are in store for the heroic Korean people.
					
					 No force on earth can prevail over the might of the army and the people of the DPRK rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche is being successfully carried forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Hideous Nuclear Criminal: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Hideous Nuclear Criminal: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed recently that the U.S. attempted to use nuclear weapons against the Korean people several times during the Korean war, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 When the U.S. was driven to a tight corner during the Korean war, it sought to create "a no man zone" which allows no access to it by spraying a lot of radioactive materials including plutonium and nuclear waste in the area which divides the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This was disclosed after a report worked out by the FBI on April 20, 1951 was declassified.
					
					 Even after the ceasefire in the Korean war, the U.S. perpetrated ceaseless military provocations and nuclear war exercises against the DPRK together with the south Korean puppet forces, kicking off nuclear hysteria.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists massively shipped nuclear weapons to south Korea and its vicinity in the postwar period, openly blustering that they suffered a miserable defeat in the Korean war as they did not use nukes.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula was designated as the next target of nuclear strike after the U.S. dropped A-bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Therefore, the peninsula remains the most dangerous region as the U.S. has never changed its scenario for nuclear attack.
					
					 The U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK have become all the more undisguised since 1976 when it kicked off the Team Spirit joint military exercises together with the south Korean puppet forces as annual events.
					
					  Historical facts go to eloquently prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal who posed a nuclear threat to the Korean Peninsula and the DPRK is its victim. 
					
					 It is an entirely legitimate measure for self-defence for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. scenario to mount a preemptive nuclear attack any time, while escalating the nuclear threat to the DPRK, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Presidential Hopeful Accused of Shielding Past Fascist Dictatorial Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Presidential Hopeful Accused of Shielding Past Fascist Dictatorial Regime
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Protests against Park Guen Hye, "presidential hopeful" from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, are growing strong among people from all walks of life in south Korea. Because she shielded the conspiratorial case cooked up during the period of the Park Chung-Hee's fascist dictatorial regime.
					 At round-table talks on Sept. 11, she made reckless remarks that the decision of acquittal made by a court as regards the case of the People's Revolutionary Party should be left to history to judge.
					
					 Infuriated by this, bereaved families of those who fell victim to the conspiratorial case and organizations of people of different social standings including the "April 9 Reunification and Peace Foundation, its corporate body", held a press conference assailing Park's remarks in front of the building of the "Saenuri Party" on Sept. 12.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference said that Park's remarks refusing to recognize the court's ruling of acquittal is little short of double killing of the victims of the case.
					
					 The inside story about the case of the People's Revolutionary Party was not disclosed in the period of the preceding regimes but was made known through media from the outset of the case's outbreak.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presented itself, Park shielded the past fascist dictatorship by asserting strange logic, made mockery of the persons involved in the case and their bereaved families, inflicting sufferings and wounds upon them, the press release said, and went on:
					
					 She should never be allowed to take the "presidential seat" as she is keen to bring back the era of "yusin" which recorded a disgraceful page in history.
					
					 In order to prevent such conspiratorial case from repeating itself in this land the "Saenuri Party" and Park Guen Hye should bend their knees before history and people and apologize for the crimes. 
					
					 At the end of the press conference the bereaved families staged a demonstration in protest against the clan of the ruling party shielding the fascist crimes committed by the "yusin" dictator in the past.
					
					 A spokesman for the Democratic United Party on Sept. 13 accused Park Guen Hye of expressing her wish to call on bereaved families and the like if they consent, while taking issue with the decision of acquittal as regards the above-said case. This is nothing but a politically-motivated farce, the spokesman said.
					
					 People are angered by Park's double-dealing attitude of shielding the bloody dictatorship while reaching out to its victims, the spokesman noted.
					
					 In the meantime, the floor leader of the above-said party and others recalled that when the results of the investigation announced in 2005 said the case was orchestrated by Park Chung-Hee, Park Guen Hye made outcry that they were a product of intrigues and plots.
					
					 They said she is not qualified to become a "presidential hopeful", urging her to directly apologize to the people.

articles.title: One-Million Signature Campaign Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
One-Million Signature Campaign Launched in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- One-million signature campaign against the unpopular education policy enforced by the puppet authorities was launched across south Korea on Sept. 5.
					 More than 230 organizations of people of all social standings are conducting a signature campaign in demand of the abolition of the registration fee at universities and free education at primary, secondary and high schools, a halt to discrimination against part-timers in the field of education and institution of a special law for aiding schools in rural areas and fishing villages, etc. 
					
					 In this connection, the Pusan branch of the Teachers Union held a press conference at the plaza of Pusan City Office on Sept.12.
					
					 The organization charged that polarization has become more serious in education since Lee Myung Bak came to power.
					
					 There should not be special schools for minority but a new environment should be created to provide an equal opportunity of education to all students, the organization held. 
					
					 It called for taking a measure at an early date to save education now going to ruin as the days go by, declaring that the members of the union would take an active part in the one-million signature campaign to eliminate the neo-liberal educational system and improve education conditions.
					
					 The signature campaign is accompanied by various actions including meetings in different parts of south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar, photo exhibition and film show took place in Bangladesh and seminars in Ethiopia and at the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between Sept. 3 and 6 on the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the photo exhibitions were photos on the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for founding and developing the DPRK.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched the Korean documentary "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said the President liberated Korea and founded the genuine people's country the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il made it possible for the DPRK to shed its brilliant rays as a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people will achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and build a thriving socialist nation in the near future, holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their supreme leader.
					
					 M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, and other reporter and speakers said the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a socialist politico-ideological and military power, adding this would have been unthinkable if Kim Jong Il had not led the Korean revolution with his outstanding political caliber.
					
					 Osieno Stephen, executive advisor to the General Secretary of the Pan-African Movement, noted that the DPRK is demonstrating its ever-increasing might thanks to the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in China, Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in China, Russia
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions took place in China and Russia from Sept. 8 to 13 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 On display in their venues were photos on undying leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men, photos and books on the glorious history of the DPRK and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and craftsmanship of Koreans.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were figures from all walks of life and masses of relevant countries.
					
					  The general director of the Painters and Calligraphers' Association of Shanghai, China, said the Sino-DPRK friendship was forged between the peoples of the two countries while fighting shoulder to shoulder in the same trench, adding this exhibition would provide Chinese visitors with an opportunity to know better about the culture and arts of the DPRK.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that the Korean people would build a thriving socialist nation as early as possible, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, an inaugural ceremony of the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held in Mudanjiang City of Heilongjiang Province, China on Aug. 31 on the 1st anniversary of Kim Jong Il's visit to the Northeastern area of China, the 52nd anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Struggle Resolutely to Implement the Three Principles of National Reunification" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house in Germany on Sept. 7.
					 The work, published on July 14, 1972, underscores the need to make strenuous efforts to implement the three principles of national reunification and indicates tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Malta, Zambia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Malta, Zambia
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's works were given publicity by a Maltese organization and a newspaper of Zambia.
					 The Group for the Study of Juche Philosophy and Songun Politics of Malta posted a detailed gist of his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on its Internet website on Sept. 5.
					
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of     Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his noble love for the country and its people.
					
					 It clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The Zambian newspaper  Zambia Daily Mail carried a detailed gist of his work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" on Sept. 8.
					
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the banquet given in celebration of Aug. 25, 2012 deals with the Songun feats performed by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called for vigorously struggling for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started and led to victory by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers devoted special write-ups to the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The September 4th issue of Xing San Daily of Thailand devoted one whole page to commemorative articles illustrated with the photo of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, laid down a unique line of the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution in conformity with the actual conditions of Korea in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He chose the road of democracy of Korean style, progressive democracy, in the period of building a new society after Korea's liberation. He originally pushed ahead with the socialist revolution and construction in line with the requirements of the Korean people and the specific conditions of Korea, not wedded to the experience of other countries or existing formulas.
					
					 The line of Songun politics which Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, successor to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung, was a steadfast independent line which helped the DPRK reliably protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country by its own efforts in the world at present when it is exposed to the imperialists' aggression and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The President set forth the original line of building an independent national economy and the line of bolstering up the self-reliant national defence capacity, turning the DPRK into an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The DPRK is steered by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the paper said, adding it will always remain shining as an independent power.
					
					 The Indian paper Fashion India carried an article entitled "Heritage of Leader Kim Jong Il" on Sept. 3.
					
					 On the same day Krishna Aberta of India dedicated a whole page to the articles "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" and "Towards the high eminence of Thriving Nation" under the headline of "On the 64th birthday of the DPRK".
					
					 The Cambodian paper Pracheachon on Sept. 5 carried a special write-up interwoven with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and an article praising his personality as a great man.

articles.title: Solidarity with Just Struggle of WPK and Korean People Expressed by Myanmar Political Figure
articles.content:
Solidarity with Just Struggle of WPK and Korean People Expressed by Myanmar Political Figure
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, issued a statement on Sept. 8 on the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, enabling the Korean people to emerge the most independent and creative people in the world.
					
					 The DPRK achieved a single-minded unity and turned into a powerful country possessed of nuclear deterrent under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, is wisely leading them in the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification by carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The progressive people all over the world support Kim Jong Un's steadfast will and stand to more firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country from all hostile moves of enemies against the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people under the leadership of Kim Jong Un are dynamically advancing for building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification along the road indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 I extend firm solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their just struggle, wishing Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people, good health and happiness.

articles.title: Cuban Radio Observes DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Cuban Radio Observes DPRK's Birthday 
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Radio Reloj of Cuba aired a special program on Sept. 7 on the 64th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The radio said under the title of "64th Birthday of the DPRK":
					
					September 9 is the birthday of the DPRK.
					
					The Cuban people send firm solidarity to the Korean people on this day.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea usurped by the Japanese imperialists and carried out all democratic reforms including land reform and nationalization of major industries.
					
					 He founded the DPRK on Sept. 9, 1948, where the people became a master of the country.
					
					 He established the best socialist system by leading to victory the difficult post-war rehabilitation and socialist construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, successor to the cause of the President, honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and national dignity by enforcing the Songun politics.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people, is bolstering up the national defence capability in every way to cope with the U.S. imperialists' evermore undisguised nuclear threat and moves for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK is now fully demonstrating its dignity as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and an invincible military power.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from South Korea Demanded by Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from South Korea Demanded by Bangladeshi Figures
						
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi figures in their statements issued on Sep. 9 and 10 demanded the U.S. forces pull out of south Korea.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said:
					
					 The bitter history of the division of the Korean nation began because of the US forces' occupation of south Korea.
					
					 They are a hotbed of a war on the Korean Peninsula and the root cause of threatening the peace in Northeast Asia and in the rest of the world.
					
					 The pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea would help bring about a decisively favorable phase for peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer insist on its forces' presence in south Korea and stick to its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We will always extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle. 
					
					 M.Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that the Korean people have been forced to under the tragedy and disgrace of national split for more than half a century due to the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. continued military presence in south Korea quite contrary to the trend of the times only betrays its invariable ambition for aggression.
					
					 Not only peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula but peace and security in Northeast Asia are unthinkable as long as the US forces are present in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should pull back its aggressor forces from south Korea at an early date and stop its moves to invade the DPRK at once.
